title: What is the closest real-life technology to Peter Parker's web-shooters and web fluid? - Quora

response.answer_text: Silly string. And no, I'm not kidding. It's a liquid under pressure and when the nozzle is depressed it shoots out under pressure and solidifies in air. A fresh can can shoot up to 20′. Sure it doesn't have the strength of his webbing or utility, but the concept is there.
Knuge, I believe DARPA has developed this non-lethal technology for military purposes for close quarter conflict. Mick
